recipes.name: Mutton Bhuna - lets_eat_with_prachi
recipes.description: This is the one thatâ€™s won over my friends and family
preparation: 1. Roast the Bhuna Masala spices in a pan on low heat for 3 minutes.
2. Grind the roasted spices into a fine powder.
3. Slice the onions, cut the green chillies, and chop the coriander leaves.
1. Heat oil in a pressure cooker/heavy-bottomed pan.
2. Fry the sliced onions for 10 minutes till golden.
3. Add the mutton pieces and sear/bhunno for 5 minutes.
4. Add the ginger garlic paste and fry for 2 minutes.
5. Add the turmeric and Kashmiri Chilli powder, and bhunno for 5 minutes.
6. Add water and pressure cook for 4 whistles or cook covered in a pan for 45 minutes.
7. Mix in whisked curd/yogurt and cook for 2-3 minutes.
8. Add 2-3 tsp ground Bhuna Masala powder and fry for 3-4 minutes.
9. Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve with naan or rice.
